verses.verse: A Psalm of thanksgiving. Make a joyful noise <WH7321> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, all ye lands <WH776>.
Serve <WH5647> Jehovah <WH3068> with gladness <WH8057>: Come <WH935> before his presence <WH6440> with singing <WH7445>.
Know <WH3045> ye that Jehovah <WH3068>, he is God <WH430>: It is he that hath made <WH6213> us <WH5971>, and we are his; We are his people, and the sheep <WH6629> of his pasture <WH4830>.
Enter <WH935> into his gates <WH8179> with thanksgiving <WH8426>, And into his courts <WH2691> with praise <WH8416>: Give thanks <WH3034> unto him <WH1288>, and bless his name <WH8034>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> is good <WH2896>; His lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>, And his faithfulness <WH530> unto all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
